name: Platformer Prototype (HadBabits)
description:
Run the RunMe file (after making it executable)

You can also find the original GDevelop file in there if you wanna poke around :v

Use the arrow keys to move, the space key to jump, and press R to restart.

So this is the first game-like thing I've actually put online, I wish I would've put some more time into it, but I'm glad I made something. It was a good learning experience, and I think I'll keep making things :) (Though I don't think I'll use Gdevelop, too unstable).

I had a concept of a game where an alien is trying to escape a secret government facility, having to evade two dim night guards and a rather mean general. Obviously I didn't get too far in actualizing this, but c'est la vie.

Oh, and all this rushed art is done by yours truly :P
